conbody.p: (c)(1)(iii)(A) The Assistant Secretary of the Army (Acquisition, Logistics and Technology), on a non-delegable basis, shall make the determination that the advance payment is in the public interest as described at FAR 32.402(c)(1)(iii)(A).
(c)(1)(iii)(B) The Secretary of the Army, on a non-delegable basis, shall make the determination that the advance payment facilitates the national defense as described at FAR 32.402(c)(1)(iii)(B).
